description: This file is a shell script designed to upload logs to a specified server, including handling TLS settings and retries. It includes functions for logging, sending HTTPS requests with curl, and managing log files for different device types.

methods.name: uploadLog
methods.description: Appends a timestamped message to the log file.

methods.name: logTLSError
methods.description: Logs TLS connection failure details based on error code.

methods.name: sendTLSSSRRequest
methods.description: Sends a TLS-secured curl request to the SSR server, logs outcome.

methods.name: HttpLogUpload
methods.description: Uploads logs to the cloud via HTTP/HTTPS, includes fallback and retry logic.

methods.name: uploadLogOnReboot
methods.description: Handles log packaging and upload on reboot, manages sleep periods and cleanup.
